name: MindRag
description:
Mind Rag is a game developed in the context of the class of Interactive Games and Narratives.

  Being mental health a prevalent topic in the current days, we were tasked with developing a game that, in some way or another, was related to that topic. So, in light of the pandemic that the world is still going through we decided to bring to life a small rag doll that would help a depressed human with daily tasks that, for someone with mental health disorders, might be hard to do, such as cleaning.  

Join Raggy in helping his human with their mundane tasks.

 This game was developed in Unity3D and C#.
